萿萿萿

萿字的基本解释

萿
kuò
麋舌草，春天生长，叶子形状似舌。

萿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuò］
［《廣韻》古活切，入末，見。］
草名。又名麋舌草。
[②]［huó］
［《類篇》户括切，入末，匣。］
见“獨萿”。

萿字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萿； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1043第15
【唐韻】古活切，音括。【爾雅·釋草】萿，麋舌。【郭註】今麋舌草，春生葉，似舌。　又【集韻】戸栝切，音活。獨萿，藥草。　【直音】作萿。字从?作。

萿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
萿字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
kuò
Elk, which grows in spring, the leaves are like tongues.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuò]
["Guangyun" is ancient and lively, enter the end, see. ]
Cursive name. Also known as Elk.
[②]［huó］
["Classic Chapter" household includes cutting, entering the end, box. ]
See "Duyu".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　萿; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1043 to 15
[Tang Yun] Ancient and lively, including sound. 【Erya·Shuicao】萿, moose tongue. [Guo's Note] Today's elk diffusa, leaves in spring, like a tongue.　[Jiyun] 戸栝切, sound lively. Alpinia, medicinal herb.　【Straight tone】Make 萿. The word is made.

huó, kuò
только в сочетаниях; см., напр., 独萿
